alert.note: Alert for Marathon; Portage; Wood (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 12 at 4:13PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT WOOD...NORTHWESTERN PORTAGE AND SOUTHWESTERN MARATHON COUNTIES THROUGH 515 PM CDT... At 413 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 10 miles west of Mosinee to 15 miles east of Marshfield to 11 miles north of Wisconsin Rapids to near Pittsville to near Babcock. Movement was east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Pea size hail and brief heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Stevens Point, Wisconsin Rapids, Mosinee, Whiting, Pittsville, Babcock, Lake Wazeecha, Nekoosa, Knowlton, and Port Edwards. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
